Xu et al,   Suppl.Table 1.
In Vivo Hemodynamic and Echocardiographic Measurements     HR (beats/min)  BW (g)  LV mass (g)  Con (n=8)  CHT (n=7)  DHT (n=7)  348  17  326  23  424  9  401  14   345  21  436  23  0.97  0.03  1.35  0.07*  1.46  0.078*  LV mass/BW (g/kg)  2.29  0.07  3.4  0.26*  3.4  0.25*  LVDd (mm)  LVDs (mm)  FS%  AWd (mm)  PWd (mm)  RWT  LVSP (mm Hg)  LVdevP/g (mm Hg/g)  LV dP/dtmax (mm Hg/s)  LV dP/dtmin (mm Hg/s)  LVEDP (mm Hg)  7.15  0.21  6.83  0.14   7.9  0.24*  3.6  0.18  3.13  0.14   5.26  0.16*  50  2   56  2*  33  2*  2.06  0.10  2.93  0.21*  2.86  0.22*  2.05  0.09  2.94  0.21*  2.94  0.14*  0.58  0.03  0.86  0.06*  0.75  0.06*  106  2   100  3   191  4*  130  7*  186  5*  119  7*  7532  228   7862  251   7263  115   4867  211   4987  192    5248  210   5.1  0.3   11.4  0.4*   13.3  0.5*  Con, Control CHT, compensated hypertrophy DHT, decompensated hypertrophy HR, heart rate  BW, body weight  LV mass, left ventricular mass  LVDd, left ventricular diastolic diameter  LVDs, left ventricular systolic diameter  FS, fractional shortening  AWd, anterior wall thickness PWd, posterior wall thickness RWT, relative wall thickness calculated as the ratio of 2 posterioir wall thickness and LVDd  LVSP, left ventricular systolic pressure LVdevP/g, left ventricular developed pressure per g LV LVEDP, left ventricular end diastolic pressure.
*P 0.05 vs Control.
